Step 1.title: Step 1: Locate Upper Arm Position:
paragraph: Step 1a: Adjust...
If shoulder is raised: +1
If upper arm is abducted: +1
If arm is supported or person is leaning: -1

Step 2.title: Step 2: Locate Lower Arm Position:
paragraph: Step 2a: Adjust...
If either arm is working across midline or out to side of body: Add +1

Step 3.title: Step 3: Locate Wrist Position:
paragraph: Step 3a: Adjust...
If wrist is bent from midline: Add +1

Step 4.title: Step 4: Wrist Twist:
paragraph: If wrist is twisted in mid-range: +1
If wrist is at or near end of range: +2

Step 5.title: Step 5: Look-up Posture Score in Table A:
paragraph: Using values from steps 1-4 above, locate score in Table A

Step 6.title: Step 6: Add Muscle Use Score
paragraph: If posture mainly static (i.e. held>10 minutes)
Or if action repeated occurs 4X per minute: +1

Step 7.title: Step 7: Add Force/Load Score:
paragraph: If load < .4.4 lbs (intermittent): +0
If load 4.4 to 22 lbs (intermittent): +1
If load 4.4 to 22 lbs (static or repeated): +2
If more than 22 lbs or repeated or shocks: +3,

Step 8.title: Step 8: Find Row in Table C
paragraph: Add values from steps 5-7 to obtain
Wrist and Arm Score. Find row in Table C.

Step 9.title: Step 9: Locate Neck Position:
paragraph: Step 9a: Adjust...
If neck is twisted: +1
If neck is side bending: +1

Step 10.title: Step 10: Locate Trunk Position:
paragraph: Step 10a: Adjust...
If trunk is twisted: +1
If trunk is side bending: +1

Step 11.title: Step 11: Legs:
paragraph: If legs and feet are supported: +1
If not: +2

Step 12.title: Step 12: Look-up Posture Score in Table B:
paragraph: Using values from steps 9-11 above locate score in Table B

Step 13.title: Step 13: Add Muscle Use Score
paragraph: If posture mainly static (i.e. held>10 minutes)
Or if action repeated occurs 4X per minute: +1

Step 14.title: Step 14: Add Force/Load Score
paragraph: If load < .4.4 lbs (intermittent): +0
If load 4.4 to 22 lbs (intermittent): +1
If load 4.4 to 22 lbs (static or repeated): +2
If more than 22 lbs or repeated or shocks: +3

Step 15.title: Step 15: Find Column in Table C
paragraph: Add values from steps 12-14 to obtain
Neck, Trunk and Leg Score. Find Column in Table C
